How to use this app.

Step 1: Click on the camera icon to take pictures of any fruits or/and vegetables. Alternatively, 
you can also choose from the gallery where your previously taken images will be stored. 
Step 2: After you have taken a new picture or have chosen an old picture from the gallery. A list will be displayed with the name of the ingredients in the picture, you can either click on the Recipes option to get recipes with the list of ingredients or you can add more ingredients with the Add option or simply type the name of the ingredient from the option in the top of the page. If you wish to delete an ingredient you can do so by holding that ingredient for some time and remove it from the option which will appear.
Step 3: After you have clicked on the Recipes option, a new screen with recipe list will appear. You can click on a particular one to see the details of the recipe.
Step 4: After you have clicked on a particular recipe from the list, a recipe detail will appear which will give you instructions on how to make that dish. It should also show you a picture of the dish. Alternatively, you can go back to the home page by clicking on the Home icon on the top of the screen and start from the beginning with new items.
